name: Tonkotsu
shortDescription: Satisfy your cravings with our savory tonkotsu ramen, topped with tender slices of pork and perfectly cooked noodles.
longDescription: Our tonkotsu ramen is a savory dish that features slow-cooked pork bones and a flavorful broth that is simmered for hours to create a rich and creamy base. The dish is served with tender slices of pork, perfectly cooked noodles, and a variety of other ingredients such as bamboo shoots, green onions, and nori. To prepare, we start by simmering the pork bones for several hours until the broth reaches the desired level of richness and creaminess. Next, we add the noodles and the toppings, and the dish is ready to serve.

name: Torikotsu
shortDescription: Indulge in the bold and delicious flavors of our torikotsu ramen, featuring tender chicken and a perfectly seasoned broth that will keep you coming back for more.
longDescription: Our torikotsu ramen is a delicious and satisfying dish that features a flavorful chicken broth that is simmered with aromatic vegetables and spices to create a savory base. The dish is served with succulent chicken, perfectly cooked noodles, and a variety of other ingredients such as bean sprouts, green onions, and nori. To prepare, we start by simmering the chicken and vegetables for several hours until the broth reaches the desired level of richness and flavor. Next, we add the noodles and the toppings, and the dish is ready to serve.

name: Salmon
shortDescription: Indulge in our delicious ramen with salmon, featuring tender pieces of grilled salmon and savory broth infused with umami flavors.
longDescription: Our ramen with salmon is a delightful dish that combines perfectly cooked noodles with tender, flaky pieces of grilled salmon in a flavorful broth that is infused with umami flavors. The broth is made with a blend of miso, soy sauce, and other seasonings, which give it a rich, savory taste that perfectly complements the tender salmon. Along with the salmon and noodles, this dish is served with a variety of toppings such as bean sprouts, green onions, and seaweed, which add a delicious crunch and texture to the dish. To prepare, we start by grilling the salmon to perfection, and then we add it to the simmering broth along with the noodles and toppings. The result is a delicious and satisfying meal that is sure to please.

name: Vegan Miso
shortDescription: Enjoy the rich flavors and satisfying textures of our vegan miso ramen, featuring handmade noodles, marinated tofu, black mushrooms, and fresh toppings.
longDescription: Our vegan miso ramen is a delicious and satisfying dish that is perfect for those looking for a meat-free option. It features a fragrant vegan broth made with oat milk and miso paste, which gives it a rich umami flavor. We then add our handmade noodles, made with only the finest ingredients and cooked to perfection, to the broth. To top it off, we add marinated tofu, black mushrooms, green onions, fried onions, corn, sesame seeds, and nori, which add a delicious crunch and texture to the dish. To prepare, we start by simmering the broth to perfection and then adding in the noodles and toppings. The result is a hearty and delicious meal that is sure to satisfy.

name: Deep fried chicken noodles
shortDescription: Wheat noodles with crispy chicken dip fry, vegetables, and a rich oyster-cream sauce.
longDescription: Our savory wheat noodles are paired with juicy chicken dip fry, crunchy vegetables, and a decadent oyster-cream sauce. Topped with marinated egg, bell pepper, sweet corn, sugar snap peas, cauliflower, carrots, spinach, edamame, wood ear mushrooms, and green onions, this dish offers a variety of textures and flavors.

name: Miso
shortDescription: Satisfy your cravings with our flavorful miso ramen with tender pork slices and savory broth.
longDescription: Our miso ramen with pork is a must-try dish for anyone looking for a hearty and flavorful meal. The dish features tender slices of pork that have been slow-cooked to perfection, giving them a melt-in-your-mouth texture. The pork is then added to a rich and savory broth made with miso paste, soy sauce, and other seasonings, which gives it a deeply satisfying umami flavor. To complete the dish, we add our perfectly cooked noodles and a variety of toppings such as bean sprouts, green onions, and seaweed, which add a delicious crunch and texture to the dish. To prepare, we start by slow-cooking the pork to perfection, and then we add it to the simmering broth along with the noodles and toppings. The result is a hearty and delicious meal that is sure to satisfy.

name: Shio
shortDescription: Our delicious Shio ramen features tender chicken, fresh handmade noodles, and savory chicken broth with a touch of sea salt.
longDescription: Our Shio ramen is a perfect balance of savory and delicate flavors. We start by slow-cooking tender chicken and preparing a flavorful broth with a hint of sea salt, which brings out the natural flavors of the ingredients. Fresh, handmade noodles are added to the broth, along with toppings such as marinated eggs, green onions, fermented bamboo shoots, and nori, which add a delightful mix of textures and flavors. The result is a delicious and satisfying meal that is perfect for any occasion.

name: Seafood Ramen
shortDescription: Seafood Ramen - a savory bowl of pork and fish broth with wheat noodles and a variety of seafood toppings.
longDescription: Our Seafood Ramen is the perfect choice for those who love a taste of the ocean. Made with a rich pork and fish broth, our wheat noodles are topped with fresh shrimp, mussels, squid, and salmon. We add a marinated wood ear mushroom, a seasoned boiled egg, and nori to the bowl for extra flavor and texture. Our Seafood Ramen is a perfect choice for seafood lovers, and is sure to satisfy your craving for something hearty and delicious.

name: Vegan Shoyu
shortDescription: Vegan shoyu ramen with handmade noodles, marinated tofu, black fungus, and nori.
longDescription: This vegan shoyu ramen features a flavorful broth made with soy sauce, handmade wheat noodles, marinated tofu, black fungus, green onions, fried onions, corn, sesame seeds, and nori. The broth is simmered to perfection, creating a savory umami flavor that pairs perfectly with the fresh noodles and tender tofu. Topped with crunchy fried onions and nutritious nori, this vegan ramen is a delicious and healthy meal that's sure to satisfy.

name: Duck Noodle
shortDescription: Duck Noodle Soup - a flavorful and satisfying dish that combines wheat noodles, succulent duck, and a variety of fresh vegetables in a savory oyster sauce broth.
longDescription: Our Duck Noodle Soup is a hearty and delicious dish that features tender slices of duck, savory wheat noodles, and an array of fresh vegetables, including bell peppers, baby peas, corn, onion, cauliflower, carrot, spinach, edamame, wood ear mushrooms, and green onions. The broth is made with a rich and savory oyster sauce, giving it a deep umami flavor that perfectly complements the tender duck and fresh vegetables. Garnished with a marinated egg, this dish is a filling and satisfying meal that's perfect for lunch or dinner.
